prompt: I have $1000 to invest, give me one best investment plan based on the agent's APY knowledge base on stable coin. Use this format for output = {'chain':'chain_name','project':'project_name','symbol':'symbol_name','tvlUsd':'tvl_amount','apyBase':'apy_amount','stablecoin':'bool'}. Do not add any characters that are not included in the format!

I have $1000 to invest, give me 2 best investment plan based on the agent's APY knowledge base on one project stable coin and one project with between token BTC, ETH, SOL and BNB. Use this format for output = [{'chain':'chain_name','project':'project_name','symbol':'symbol_name','tvlUsd':'tvl_amount','apyBase':'apy_amount','stablecoin':'bool'}, {'chain':'chain_name','project':'project_name','symbol':'symbol_name','tvlUsd':'tvl_amount','apyBase':'apy_amount','stablecoin':'bool'}]. Do not add any characters that are not included in the format!

I have $1000 to invest, give me one best investment plan based on the agent's APY knowledge base with highest APY. Use this format for output = {'chain':'chain_name','project':'project_name','symbol':'symbol_name','tvlUsd':'tvl_amount','apyBase':'apy_amount','stablecoin':'bool'}. Do not add any characters that are not included in the format!
